Searching for Sugar Man is a 2012 Swedish - British documentary film directed by Malik Bendjelloul , which details the efforts of two Cape Town fans in the late 1990 s , Stephen ' Sugar ' Segerman and Craig Bartholomew Strydom , to find out whether the rumored death of American musician Sixto Rodriguez was true , and , if not , to discover what had become of him .
